message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to us, I propose a price of $120 for it. This is a special offer tailored to your needs, taking into account its worth to you at $80. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, I'm really looking to stay within my budget of $80. Would you be willing to consider a price of $85? I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to accommodate them. In light of this, I am proposing a revised price of $90 for the product. This still reflects the value we place on it while being more aligned with your current budget. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.
